```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

First step is to read in the provided data
```{r}
gas_data <- read_csv(here("data", "HW3_data.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()

# view data
ggplot(data = gas_data, aes(x = q_low_gallons, y = price_dollars))+
  geom_point()+
  theme_bw()
```
